code: import{connect}from'react-redux';import{ButtonSegment}from'../Components/ButtonSegment';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{num:state.num,url:state.url,month:state.month,year:state.year,news:state.news,safe_title:state.safe_title,transcript:state.transcript,alt:state.alt,img:state.img,title:state.title,day:state.day};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{previousClick:function previousClick(){return dispatch({type:'PREVIOUS'});},nextClick:function nextClick(){return dispatch({type:'NEXT'});},randomClick:function randomClick(){return dispatch({type:'RANDOM'});}};};export var ButtonContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ButtonSegment);
